doc.previous: The PID controller is probably the most used feedback control design PID is an initialism for Proportional Integral Derivative referring to the three terms operating on the error signal to produce a control signal If u t is the control signal sent to the system y t is the measured output and r t is the desired output and tracking error a PID controller has the general form
